mapper.update: UPDATE T_INVENTORY SET F_SHOPNUM = #{inventory.shopNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, F_UPDATETIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE F_ID = #{inventory.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE T_INVENTORY SET F_SHOPNUM = 0, F_UPDATETIME = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE F_ID = #{inventory.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_INVENTORY WHERE F_COMMODITYID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
